definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: If a crime is constituted, the person in charge shall be investigated for criminal responsibilities according to law.
sentences.chinese: 構成犯罪的，對責任人員依法追究刑事責任。

sentences.english: You can’t fix a systemwide problem by simply blaming or retraining individuals.
sentences.chinese: 對責任人進行指責或再培訓，不能修復系統性問題。

sentences.english: Improving the quality of post-graduate program is the primary responsibility of the tutors.
sentences.chinese: 導師是保障和提高研究生培養質量的主要責任人。

sentences.english: Sunday's result paves the way for the prosecution of the generals responsible.
sentences.chinese: 此次公投結果爲起訴軍方責任人奠定了基礎。

definition: to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
to make secret inquiries/to investigate in secret
to recover (stolen property)/to pursue and force sb to give back the spoils
to confer/to consult/to negotiate/to hold a conference
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
to relieve sb of his post/to sack/to demote/dismissal/sacking
